record.description: [Photographic copy of a drawing] of the new International House to be built on the University of Chicago's quadrangle. Construction on the structure, which is to house 500 foreign students, will begin early next year on the site of the old Del Prado Hotel on the Midway. Holabird and Root, architects, are now drafting the final plans. John D. Rockefeller Jr. has provided the funds.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: White paint covers much of the surface of the image. Stamp: date received.
